mapper.select: select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.food_id in (select food_id from food where seller_id = #{sellerId}) and DATE(fo.order_time) = CURDATE() and fo.is_finish = 1

select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.food_id in (select food_id from food where seller_id = #{sellerId}) and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(fo.order_time) and fo.is_finish = 1

select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.food_id in (select food_id from food where seller_id = #{sellerId}) and date_format(fo.order_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') and fo.is_finish = 1

select sum(fo.order_number) as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice, DATE_FORMAT(fo.finish_time,'%e') dayInMonth from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id inner join seller s on s.seller_id = f.seller_id where s.seller_id = #{sellerId} and DATE_FORMAT(fo.finish_time,'%y-%m') = #{currentYearMonth} GROUP BY dayInMonth and fo.is_finish = 1 order by fo.finish_time
